The maxEvidenceCount should be 1 to get the first mention. 

Wait, the user mentioned "назови их имена" which means to name the characters. So the task description should be something like "Find the first dialog between two named characters and report their names." 

I need to make sure that the agent scans the document using the cursor and returns the first paragraph that meets the criteria. The response should include the names of the characters involved in the first dialog. If the cursor returns more items, I might need to call the agent again, but since we're looking for the first one, maxEvidenceCount=1 should suffice. Let me structure the tool call accordingly.
